terminate.reason:
A development tool that is not included in the production enviornment. 
There is no operating function depending on it.

certifi.reason: Used for network security (https communications) - i.e. protocol standards

jwcrypto.reason: Used for network security (library for decoding security tokens) - i.e. protocol standards

chardet.reason: Ancillary tool used to help parse texts (strings)

wordpress.reason: A popular blogging engine, with Bowtie customized modifications to support marketing (Search Engine Optimization)
